title: Silent Failure of GetTargetFrameworks when using platform negotiation
body: I am trying to implement project to project platform negotiation in my Repo but it relies on the GetTargetFrameworks  target. this target appears to be failing silently which doesnt allow platform negotiation to work properyl. is there a way to enable more verbose logging to get target frameworks?

nodes.body:
The binary log should be able to present a pretty good picture of the flow here. It generally looks something like this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3347530/222271855-b5f958ed-3f74-4e9a-80e0-8112b3a01198.png)
Was the comment above helpful? Is there anything else we can help with?
This issue is marked as stale because feedback has been requested for 30 days with no response. Please respond within 14 days or this issue will be closed due to inactivity.

This issue was closed due to inactivity. If you can still reproduce this bug, please comment with the requested information, detailed steps to reproduce the problem, or any other notes that might help in the investigation.
